markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Guildmaster](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3414)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

In cities, artisans working in a common trade often form guilds to set standards of quality, establish common prices, engage in collective bargaining with business owners, and lobby local governments for favorable laws. The guildmaster— often a master artisan in their own right—also acts as an administrator and politician, advocating for artisans in their trade.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Guildmaster.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Guildmaster](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3414)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 9

**Perception** +16

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Architecture Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +25, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +13, [Bureaucracy Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +19, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37) +25, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +24, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +22, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +21

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Craft Specialist** For encounters involving matters of crafting or architecture, the guildmaster is a 12th-level challenge.

**Items**
[Artisan's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3), construction schematics, guildmaster's uniform (functions as [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=44)), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2829) [light hammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=384)_, tax ledgers

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +17 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 135

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_light hammer_ +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d6+5 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_light hammer_ +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 2d6+5 bludgeoning

**Call to Action** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The guildmaster gives a speech to inspire themself and all guild-member allies within 60 feet, granting a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls until the start of the guildmaster's next turn.

**Sworn Duty**   While within the guild or presiding over guild business, the guildmaster gains a +2 circumstance bonus to weapon attack rolls and deals an additional 2d6 damage on a successful weapon attack.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-531" />
name: Guildmaster

text: Guildmaster In cities, artisans working in a common trade often form guilds to set standards of quality, establish common prices, engage in collective bargaining with business owners, and lobby local governments for favorable laws. The guildmaster— often a master artisan in their own right—also acts as an administrator and politician, advocating for artisans in their trade. Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 24 Unspecific Lore : DC 22 Specific Lore : DC 19 Guildmaster Source NPC Core pg. 9 Perception +16 Languages Common Skills Architecture Lore +25, Athletics +13, Bureaucracy Lore +19, Crafting +25, Diplomacy +24, Intimidation +22, Society +21 Str +3 Dex +1 Con +2 Int +4 Wis +2 Cha +3 Craft Specialist For encounters involving matters of crafting or architecture, the guildmaster is a 12th-level challenge. Items Artisan's Tools, construction schematics, guildmaster's uniform (functions as hide armor), +1 striking light hammer , tax ledgers --- AC 26 Fort +14 Ref +14 Will +17 HP 135 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action light hammer +16 (Agile, Magical), Damage 2d6+5 bludgeoning Melee Single Action fist +16 (Agile, Nonlethal, Unarmed), Damage 1d4+5 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action light hammer +14 (Agile, Magical, thrown 20 feet), Damage 2d6+5 bludgeoning Call to Action Single Action (Auditory, Concentrate, Emotion, Mental) The guildmaster gives a speech to inspire themself and all guild-member allies within 60 feet, granting a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls until the start of the guildmaster's next turn. Sworn Duty While within the guild or presiding over guild business, the guildmaster gains a +2 circumstance bonus to weapon attack rolls and deals an additional 2d6 damage on a successful weapon attack.
